Cédric Beust ♔ wrote:
> On 2/1/06, J. B. Rainsberger <jbrains@...> wrote:
>  >
>  >
>  > What's up with that? Why do so many people find reflection so dangerous?
> 
>    - Loss of static typing

Who needs training wheels? :)

>    - Can break when refactoring

That's why we have tests.

>    - Performance overhead

Not dangerous: we don't worry about the performance overhead of invoking 
methods or extracting interfaces or superclasses.
